Services

  • Design services emphasizing customer sensitivities and requirements. Functional re-design of spaces and areas in homes and businesses.
  • Design and build custom cabinet-work, specializing in curve cabinetry.
  • Research for documentation of architectural features, or provenance.
  • Assistance with designation or grant processes.
  • Aid in securing financial needs.
  • Links to areas of related interests.
  • Consultation and project management.
  • Duplication, replication, repair, or creation of new items to specification.
